FLOW.COMMENT: split into each set of properties (name=value;name=value;name=value)

INVOKE.COMMENT: split into each set of properties (name=value;name=value;name=value)
See how many sets of name=value pairs were returned

SEQUENCE.NAME: %size%>0
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Only continue if the number of sets returned was greater than 0

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: This means that they wanted a specific key

SEQUENCE.NAME: $null
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: This means they want the full list of key value pairs

INVOKE.COMMENT: split up the name=value, into the name and the value, and put it into the table of values
Get the size. The size should be 2 [key/value]. If size of 1, no value specified

BRANCH.COMMENT: Check to make sure we have a valid key and value

MAP.NAME: %valueListSize% < 2
MAP.COMMENT: Value must have been null, set value to empty string and move into table

MAP.NAME: $default
MAP.COMMENT: Move the valid key/value pair into table
